Instruction: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl. Mix in milk, butter, and vanilla. Beat in eggs until the mixture is smooth.

Preheat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop 1/4 cup of batter onto the griddle for each crêpe, then tilt the pan in a circular motion to spread the batter evenly across the surface.
Cook the crêpe for approximately 2 minutes until the bottom is lightly browned, then use a spatula to flip and cook the other side.
Keep the completed crêpes stacked with wax paper in between each one and covered with a dry cloth until serving.
